title: Wanted: Original SO-42 pop top seal

posts.content:
Don't need a whole seal.
If you have an original one... or even a piece... I'd like it.
No one is making a correct seal. Yeah, there's repro ones that do the job... but I'd like to look into getting a correct one made for all us pop-toppers.
If you've got something you're about to toss in the garbage... I'd like it.
Postage paid.
Thanks,
Evan
